mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT coursename FROM course WHERE teaid=#{teaid};
SELECT courseclass FROM course WHERE teaid=#{teaid} and coursename=#{coursename};
SELECT coursename,courseclass FROM course WHERE teaid=#{teaid};
select s.*,sc.coursename from score s,selectcourse sc where sc.selectcourseid=s.selectcourseid and sc .teaid=#{teaid};
